title: Those who make the way: Mount Isa, the first fifty years
creator_credit: Fraser Castle Productions, Norman Castle, Lilias Castle and Fraser Film and Video
brief_description: Looks at the Queensland town of Mount Isa, and the way in which it grew to be a major mining centre.
